div.p: Description: The South Carolina Department of Health and Environmental Control GIS Spatial Data Accuracy Tiers have been derived from the National Standard for Spatial Data Accuracy as a means to categorize the accuracy of spatial data assignment utilizing a variety of tools for capturing coordinates including digitizers, geocoding software and global positioning system devices.

description.value: Description: The South Carolina Department of Health and Environmental Control GIS Spatial Data Accuracy Tiers have been derived from the National Standard for Spatial Data Accuracy as a means to categorize the accuracy of spatial data assignment utilizing a variety of tools for capturing coordinates including digitizers, geocoding software and global positioning system devices.
